svg.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; height: 20px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible; width: 20px

line.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible

transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible
